articles.title: Nykaa Q2 Results: Profit surges 344% YoY to Rs 5.2 crore; revenue jumps 39% - Economic Times
articles.description: Nykaa Q2 Results: In an exchange filing, Nykaa said its EBITDA improved to Rs 61 crore vs Rs 28.8 crore in the year-ago period. Its consolidated margin also improved to 4.9% against 3.3% on a YoY basis.
